name: Nubis Jump
description:
Jump! Jump across 4 dangerous mystic worlds full of enemies.

Find the magic boots to jump high in the air!

Just TAP the screen and make up to two jumps before touching the ground again.

Pick up pink crystals to unlock your favourite haracter: smile, frog, bird, cat, skull, rabbit, hat, hotdog, donat, burger, cube, flower and many others.

-- Wait for the right moment
-- Then tap on the screen to jump
-- Don't fall off the cubes

Follow us @nanovationlabs
